code: import*as types from"../constants";import{toggleTheme}from"../../services/themeService";export function enableClassicTheme(){return enableTheme("classic");}export function enableCorporateTheme(){return enableTheme("corporate");}export function enableModernTheme(){return enableTheme("modern");}function enableTheme(name){toggleTheme(name);return{type:types.THEME_TOGGLE,payload:name};}
